definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Latin origin, derived from Marcus, meaning 'dedicated to Mars', the Roman god of war. It is commonly used in Germanic, Scandinavian, and English-speaking countries.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自拉丁语的男性名，由 Marcus 演变而来，意为‘献给战神玛尔斯’。在日耳曼、斯堪的纳维亚及英语国家中广泛使用。
definitions.example_en: Markus is the team leader who designed the new user interface.
definitions.example_cn: 马库斯是设计新用户界面的团队负责人。
